alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 1:31AM CDT until June 27 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 130 AM MDT. * At 1231 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chadron, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gordon, Rushville, Hay Springs, Clinton, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Lone Butte, Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road, Mount Maria and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 105. Highway 250 between mile markers 41 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
